algorithm_technique: Sorting, iterating through partitions, and calculating potential ranges
problem_summary_simple: Minimize the difference between max and min elements by adding or subtracting k from each element.
problem_summary_technical: Sort the array, then iterate through possible split points to find the minimum range after applying +/- k.
key_insights: After sorting, any split point divides the array into two groups: one where k is added, and one where k is subtracted.
The minimum range will occur when the maximum of one group and the minimum of the other are considered.
The initial range (before any operations) is a baseline for comparison.
